content:
The Sep Connectathon is coming up soon! Some details:

  • Track Description -Â https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-09+CDS+Hooks
  • Track Kick-off/Orientation on Thursday, Sep 9th @ 12pm Eastern
  • Sep 14th/15th will have two checkpoints
    • First at 9am Eastern
    • Second at 2pm Eastern
  • There will be an educational talk on - Intro to CDS Hooks by Dennis Patterson Sep 14th @ 1pm Eastern

Registration closes August 30th!

Welcome everyone to HL7 Connectathon 28 CDS Hooks Track! Check out the track confluence page https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-09+CDS+Hooks for more information about this track.

Update the participant tracker
https://bit.ly/cds-hooks-connectathon-tracking

Use Sep 2021 Connectathon topic in Zulip for questions/discussion
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179159-cds-hooks/topic/Sep.202021.20Connectathon

See you all at the CDS Hooks Day 1 stand-up @ 9 am est

Use Con Man app to share your results about connecting with other systems ->
http://conman.clinfhir.com/connectathon.html?event=con28

Short video on Con Man ->
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GRcFGlnHKo0

Hi everyone!

We built a cds service that's invoked on the order-sign hook. Does anyone have any recommendations/know of a client we can use for testing purposes that works with order-sign? AFAIK the CDS sandbox works with patient-view and order-select only at this time. Thanks!
I believe Epic supports both order-select and order-sign. @Matt Sargent - Can you confirm?

Epic Feb 21 and beyond supports order-sign. We have successfully used order-sign with Epic sites in pilots. Matt can confirm, but I believe the Epic Connectathon sandbox will support order-select too.
CDS Hooks Track participants - Thank you so much for your participation this time. Connectathon report out is available here
